column2: "Hee hee! Nice work! I don't even have to read your report to see that. You really had some fine moves out there!"
"You sure made those hostiles dance and suffer before you wiped them out completely. You're an amazing Ranger."
"So do you feel refreshed and clear-headed now? And ooh, how about that exquisite feeling of dominating the enemy?"
"That's the joy of being a Ranger. Remember that, and your life will sparkle like a big, shiny gun. And there's nothing lovelier than a gun!"
"Next time, let's make even more hostiles suffer and suffer and then suffer some more!"
